mapper.select: SELECT S.PRODUCTDETAIL_NUM as productDetailID, S.COUNT as count, P.PRODUCT_PRICE as price , P.PRODUCT_NAME as name, P.PRODUCT_ID as productId, R.MARKET_NAME as marketName FROM SHOPPING_BASKET_TB S LEFT JOIN PRODUCTDETAIL_TB P ON S.PRODUCTDETAIL_NUM = P.ID LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_TB R ON P.PRODUCT_ID = R. ID WHERE S.USER_ID = #{user_id}
